document_notes.text:
This update for gtk3 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-6655: Fixed library injection from current working directory (bsc#1228120)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A flaw was found in the GTK library. Under certain conditions, it is possible for a library to be injected into a GTK application from the current working directory.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
